short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate your GPA easily! Log into Skyward & navigate to your gradebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate your grade point average with ease with our extension! Log into your Skyward account and then navigate to your Gradebook as normal in Skyward.

Version 3.0.0 Developer Notes:
- Bug fixes and updates to account for the 2024-2025 school year.

Please email any bugs/errors/comments to the developer email listed. Issues will be taken care of as soon as possible.
